ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: An introduction to the major literary, intellectual, and artistic figures of the Italian Renaissance through an approach that challenges our preconceived notions of a crucial period in history that has profoundly shaped modern Western culture.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Thought I came to Yale with great confidence in my conviction to become a medievalist. This course has had such a profound effect on me that it has led me to think that perhaps I would find equal intellectual fulfillment as a Renaissance scholar. The course allowed me to become familiar with major critical voices in the period and to explore my interest in gender. It has also inspired to pursue further study and research on the period.
